required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: VEIN Health - CVD Prevalence and Characteristics
clinical_study.official_title: VEIN Health Chronic Venous Disease at Primary and Specialized Healthcare Level -Update on Prevalence and Characteristics

brief_summary.textblock: Epidemiology Study to learn prevalence and characteristics of CVD at Primary and Specialized healthcare level

detailed_description.textblock: Cross sectional study that will evaluate prevalence, characteristics, diagnostic and treatment status of the patients with Chronic Venous Disease at primary or specialized healthcare level during 2 week period. No interventions are made. Information on patient demographic, physical, clinical parameters, medical history data and procedures performed during visit in routine daily practice of physicians is registered and analyzed.

primary_outcome.description: Percent of CVD symptomatic patients among patients applying to consultation for any reason
Percent of CVD patients with various CEAP stages

primary_outcome.measure: Prevalence of risk-factors associated with CVD
primary_outcome.description: Frequency of risk-factors associated with CVD
Tactics chosen by physicians to manage CVD

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients applying to Primary Healthcare Consultation
arm_group.description: Consequent patients applying to the Primary healthcare to consult for any reason during 2 week period

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients applying to Specialized Healthcare Consultation
arm_group.description: Consequent patients applying to the Specialized healthcare to consult for any reason during 2 week period

intervention.description: Study is provided in the usual daily practice of the physicians without interventions made in their practice
intervention.arm_group_label: Patients applying to Primary Healthcare Consultation
Patients applying to Specialized Healthcare Consultation

study_pop.textblock: Patients applying to consultation due to any reason

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age above 18 years
- Patient consented to participate
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient applying due to emergency situation
